GLUE-Math with POSIX standard
Test Suite:
  Natural Exponent

[Calculation Test]
Polymorphism Pattern:
  Real variable -> Real solution
>>> RMath.exp(x)
  (x)   float     double             long double

[Property of Pole]
  - CHECK THE MACHINE CONSTANT IN THE ARGUMENT -

  List Table Details:
  mac_emax := Maximum exponent of the calculation bound
  mac_emin := Minimum exponent of the calculation bound
  arg+inf  := Solution the argument is +Infinity
  arg-inf  := Solution the argument is -Infinity
  arg_nan  := Solution the argument is NaN

  type  mac_emax  mac_emin   arg+inf   arg-inf   arg_nan
   flt        88       -86  Infinity       0.0       NaN
   dbl       710      -707  Infinity       0.0       NaN
  ldbl     11357    -11355  Infinity       0.0       NaN
